I wanted to share something awesome with you: the Million Voices Candidate Fact Sheet! ğŸ—³ï¸It's your go-to website for understanding where Pennsylvania senate candidates stand-straight from their own words! ğŸ¤ We also have candidate fact sheets on the presidential election.
No re-phrasing or spin-this site gives you videos, posts, and policy statements so you can hear the facts DIRECTLY from the candidates themselves. ğŸ’¬ Plus, you'll get real-time updates on the candidates and issues that matter to you!
We want YOU to vote for the candidate with the best policies for all of us. ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸
Want to check it out? Just visit https://millionvoices.org/pascfs/ or reply YES to this message, and we'll send it to you directly! âœ…
